definition: indirect in departing from the accepted or proper way, a diagonally arranged abdominal muscle on either side of the torso
details:
adjective
- indirect in departing from the accepted or proper way
= synonyms: devious
- slanting or inclined in direction or course or position--neither parallel nor perpendicular nor right-angled
= example: slanting or inclined in direction or course or position--neither parallel nor perpendicular nor right-angled
noun
- a diagonally arranged abdominal muscle on either side of the torso
= synonyms: external oblique muscle, musculus obliquus externus abdominis, abdominal external oblique muscle
- any grammatical case other than the nominative
= synonyms: oblique case
